none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2020-08-vi/extracted/VI - demo/02 En Sløv Kniv i Brustet

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on August 29, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
Tape traders. Fucking love 'em. This is from the same tape as the WAR OF DESTRUCTION that appeared here a few weeks back, a screaming recording of tracks from the underrated The Triumph Of Death EP. Worth noting that you can still snag the record for a few bucks...and you should.  (EP DEMO)
